job.title: Software Engineer, Backend (LA/Austin)
job.description:
The fastest-growing High School and College sport in America isn’t basketball or football—it’s esports—and PlayVS is the official platform for High School and Collegiate esports. We offer an incredible, full-stack esport platform—game integrations, team building tools, leagues, tournaments, and schedules—and our software products tie everything together into a cohesive experience.
We are looking for a passionate backend Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for helping us build new, and maintain existing, APIs and services.
Here's What You'll Get To Do
Work with a small team comprised of engineers, a product manager, and designer to build our product.
Collaborate with other engineers and teams to develop new features, GraphQL APIs, improvements, and fixes to handle our current and future scale.
Troubleshoot production issues and implement fixes for them.
Help our customers have an awesome experience with our products.
Write, audit, and improve our test coverage
Here's What We're Looking For
5+ years of product development experience
Thorough understanding of node.js and its core principles
Familiarity with TypeScript
Familiarity with GraphQL and Apollo
Experience building and delivering successful products. You can take rough themes and big ideas and turn them into product features with minimal guidance
Passionate about PlayVS and the problem we are solving
Committed desire to understand our customers
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Possess a growth mindset: Live and breathe experimentation, data analysis, and ruthlessly prioritize for impact
